main event: Two unidentified objects were detected on radar in Belleville, Michigan on November 4, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were approximately 3/4 the size of a small object and 'jumped around' the area.
The objects were detected on ground radar for 2 to 3 minutes.
The objects remained stationary during the sighting.
The case was classified as 'Unable to Identify, Possible Aircraft'.
No photographs were included in the report.
